N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.4 - Selection of vests

State Regulations
(a) Selection of vest vendors shall be a determination to be made by the
applicant. (b) The applicant shall
insure that such vests comply with the standards adopted by section
6030.3
and the specifications set
forth in section
6030.6
of this Part. (c) The applicant shall certify to the
commissioner, in such form and in such manner as he shall require, that any
such vest is classified under the standard adopted by section
6030.6
of this Part as capable of
protecting the officer to whom such vest is issued to at least the ballistic
specifications of the standard issue weapon and ammunition assigned to or
authorized for use by the officer. (d) The applicant shall secure and maintain a
permanent record of the manufacturer's certificate of insurance. (e) The applicant shall determine whether one
or two carriers are to be provided for each vest. A second carrier may be
required to permit uninterrupted use of the vest while the first carrier is
being laundered. (f) In connection
with any application for reimbursement for the purchase of vests, the applicant
shall provide, in such form and in such manner as the commissioner shall
require, the following information with respect to each vest: (1)
the name of the officer to whom such vest
is issued; (2)
the date on which
such officer was issued such vest; and
(3)
a statement indicating whether the
officer receiving such vest has, at any time in the previous 10 years, been
provided with any other vest for which State reimbursement was provided under

Executive Law, section 837-d or former Labor Law, article 17-a and the date of
any such prior reimbursement. Notes
